ai_explanation.introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is 'りょかん' which you will often hear in travel related discussions and when planning accommodation in Japan.
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word 'りょかん' means a traditional Japanese inn where you may find tatami matted rooms, communal baths, and other cultural amenities. These inns are known for providing a more traditional and culturally rich lodging experience compared to Western hotels, often including meals in the stay.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

ryokan.VI: nhà trọ hoặc nhà trọ truyền thống của Nhật Bản
ryokan.TL: inn o tradisyonal na inn ng Hapon
ryokan.MY: အိပ်ဆောင်၊ ဂျပန်ရိုးရာအိပ်ဆောင်

examples.kanji: 自然がいっぱいの旅館です。
examples.furigana: 自然(しぜん)がいっぱいの旅館(りょかん)です。

translations.EN: It is an inn full of nature.
translations.ID: Ini adalah penginapan yang penuh dengan alam.
translations.ES: Es una posada llena de naturaleza.
translations.VI: Đây là một nhà trọ đầy thiên nhiên.
translations.FR: C'est une auberge pleine de nature.
translations.ZH: 这是一个充满自然的旅馆。
translations.TL: Ito ay isang inn na puno ng kalikasan.
translations.MY: ဤနေရာသည် သဘာဝအလှအပများပြည့်နှက်နေသော ပျော်စရာလေးတစ်ခုဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: यह एक ऐसा सराय है जो प्रकृति से भरपूर है।
translations.FA: این یک مسافرخانه پر از طبیعت است.

examples.kanji: おんせん旅館のよやくをしました。
examples.furigana: おんせん旅館(りょかん)のよやくをしました。

translations.EN: I made a reservation at the hot spring inn.
translations.ID: Saya membuat reservasi di penginapan air panas.
translations.ES: Hice una reserva en el hostal de aguas termales.
translations.VI: Tôi đã đặt phòng tại nhà trọ suối nước nóng.
translations.FR: J'ai réservé à l'auberge aux sources chaudes.
translations.NE: मैले एक तातो पानीको लागि होटेलमा आरक्षण गरे।
translations.BN: আমি একটি গীর্জা থার্মাল ইন রিজার্বেশন করেছি।
translations.ZH: 我预订了一个温泉旅馆。
translations.TL: Nagpa-reserve ako sa hot spring inn.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော့်အနေဖြင့် ရေပူစမ်း လမ်းလျှောက်ခရီးသွားရန် ကြိုတင်မှာယူခဲ့ပါသည်။
translations.HI: मैंने हॉट स्प्रिंग इन में बुकिंग की।
translations.FA: من در یک مهمانخانه چشمه آب گرم رزرو کردم.

examples.kanji: その旅館は失礼な態度でした。
examples.furigana: その旅館(りょかん)は失礼(しつれい)な態度(たいど)でした。

translations.EN: That inn had a rude attitude.
translations.ES: Ese ryokan tenía una actitud grosera.
translations.VI: Nhà trọ đó có thái độ không lễ phép.
translations.FR: Cette auberge avait une attitude malpolie.
translations.NE: त्यो अतिथि घरको व्यवहार अशिष्ट थियो।
translations.TL: Ang mga tauhan sa ryokan na iyon ay may bastos na ugali.
translations.MY: အဲ့ဟိုတယ်သည် ယဉ်ကျေးမှုမရှိသော အပြုအမူကို ပြသခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: वह आवासगृह का रवैया अशिष्ट था।
translations.FA: آنجا مسافرخانه‌ای با رفتار بی‌ادبانه بود.

examples.kanji: 旅館での朝ごはんが美味しいです。
examples.furigana: 旅館(りょかん)での朝(あさ)ごはんが美味(おい)しいです。

translations.EN: The breakfast at the inn is delicious.
translations.ES: El desayuno en la posada es delicioso.
translations.VI: Bữa sáng tại nhà trọ rất ngon.
translations.FR: Le petit-déjeuner à l'auberge est délicieux.
translations.MY: Guesthouse တွင် နံနက်စာ အရသာရှိသည်။

synonyms: ホテル : ホテル : hotel
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym for 'りょかん' is 'ホテル.' While both refer to places where travelers can stay overnight, 'りょかん' offers a traditional Japanese experience and atmosphere, whereas 'ホテル' usually refers to a more Western-style lodging with modern conveniences.
antonyms: ビジネスホテル : ビジネスホテル : business hotel
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of 'りょかん' is 'ビジネスホテル.' A 'ビジネスホテル' is designed to cater primarily to business travelers, offering basic accommodations without the traditional Japanese elements found in 'りょかん.' The focus is more on practicality than cultural experience.

collocations: しぜんがいっぱいのりょかん
おんせんりょかんのよやく
しつれいなたいどのりょかん
りょかんでのあさごはん
